name: Overview
data: [{"id":"db5d5ead-7a7a-48f1-8811-23d94819a106","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Folder Overview: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e295bfe7-437a-4f33-9b4a-cb11fe4dc626","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder contains the engine room of the Jarvis analysis framework. It houses the core logical components that transform raw Python source code into a sophisticated, traversable model of program behavior. Rather than simple text matching, the modules within this folder cooperate to perform deep ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"inter-procedural, flow-sensitive analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"06bf02be-b3af-4977-b4c4-571cb8f67d93","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The folder is organized into three distinct layers that work in tandem to understand the project’s structure, data movement, and execution patterns.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"76c274e8-0d8c-4167-8c00-a70d056e1cb6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"21dd150f-20b0-44e4-ae8b-b30e3b739d56","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Groups","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"13aa85cc-b1fa-4c5b-ac63-f98520ffd33e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. Structural Foundations (Static Architecture)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc189f47-69b2-40b3-acc1-8c0b7b003aed","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This layer acts as the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Blueprint Architect","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Its primary responsibility is to map out the physical and logical skeleton of the project.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2f289d7-3464-42a8-a15e-c1b184074b2b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Modules","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"classes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scopes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nodes.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"imports.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0642f7c-3d75-4875-8618-a7ce80525f20","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These modules identify every file, class hierarchy, and lexical scope. They build the \"map\" that allows the other engines to know exactly where a piece of code resides and what its structural relationships are (such as inheritance via MRO or nested function visibility).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"359e64c0-4fb6-4292-9d0f-de2a950da10c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Data Modeling & Value Propagation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"26219f83-def3-4313-9420-80a3770bdd76","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This layer acts as the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Intelligence Engine","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It focuses on the \"what\" and the \"how\" of data movement—a process known as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"points-to analysis","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"df8d8934-2a1a-41f2-90c2-1abc660ed19c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Modules","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"definitions.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pointers.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"returns.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9a3b7161-1281-4b90-9110-670d28548cc5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This group tracks the \"life\" of data. It manages how variables are assigned, how values flow through assignments, and how function return values are captured by callers. It maintains a temporal history of variable states, allowing the system to know what a variable points to at any specific line of code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2be7b65f-c79c-44d2-b9d2-0c5b353c7f07","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Execution Logic & State Management","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4983fc19-d264-401a-9c89-7708265d7d3e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This layer acts as the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Behavioral Tracker","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It records the actual interactions between different parts of the blueprint.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ca948245-0e8a-44fb-884f-b7e38369c127","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Modules","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callgraph.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"gol.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key_err.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e8f933ee-bd4b-49f9-91d5-2ee53aea0979","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": These modules record function invocations as they happen, maintaining a chronological record of the \"calls\" relationship. They ultimately synthesize this data into a high-level ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Call Graph","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which provides the final architectural view of how the system executes and where potential errors (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") might occur.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"933b37fb-a157-4dd3-8468-fe239a0e0c41","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"0ffc7db9-050b-4e6c-9cf5-cf4983a6ab8f","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Collaborative Workflow","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"25924117-4975-4e9c-806d-e9395bb6793e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"To analyze a single line of code like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = auth.validate(data)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"machinery","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" folder coordinates as follows:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bdded639-10f0-45ac-afb7-674c80f44948","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Structural","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"imports","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"modules","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" identify where ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth.validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is defined; ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"nodes","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" fetches the code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e16d0367-0a40-4298-822a-c8fde28c16e0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Execution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"calls","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" records that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is being invoked from the current line with ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"data","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as an argument.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bc92720c-2716-4cc9-9530-bd4ca09c3d42","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Data Modeling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pointers","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" binds the value of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"data","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the target function's parameters; ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"returns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" prepares to catch whatever ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sends back.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c4570954-c3f3-4841-b403-4371df07d502","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Finalization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callgraph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" adds a permanent link between the current function and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth.validate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the final report.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3138f18b-fad0-4cc7-91ff-b07d25fab5d3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This modular architecture ensures that Jarvis is both robust and precise, capable of tracing complex logic across large-scale Python applications.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f9580608-0a9e-47e4-aab9-f6f8a0e17a99","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
